synopsis.text:
Seven members of the Trinity team, including Arata and Lilith, are pitted against their most formidable foe yet in "Trinity Seven: Heavens Library & Crimson Lord." The enemy in question is none other than Lilith's estranged father, who holds the title of the strongest Demon Lord. As a newly minted Demon Lord candidate, Arata must rise to the challenge and confront this powerful adversary.

In this second installment of the "Trinity Seven" franchise, Arata, Lilith, Akio, and Lugh embark on a mission to explore ancient ruins, which turn out to be the remnants of Akio's former home. As they delve deeper, they discover that the same magical force that once destroyed the city is now targeting them. After narrowly escaping the initial attack, the group finds themselves in the Sky Library, a repository of legendary weapons.

However, their brief respite is shattered by the awakening of the Blood-Red Demon King, the very entity responsible for Akio's homeland's destruction. With Lilith now held captive by this formidable enemy, Arata and his friends must rally to save her. To succeed, they'll need to strengthen their abilities and prepare for a climactic battle between a Demon King and a Demon Lord candidate.
